sourcesContent:
<template>
  <n-config-provider :theme="dark ? darkTheme : null" :theme-overrides="myTheme">
    <n-message-provider>
      <router-view></router-view>
    </n-message-provider>
    <n-global-style />
  </n-config-provider>
</template>

<script setup>
import { ref, provide } from 'vue'

import {
  NConfigProvider,
  NMessageProvider,
  darkTheme,
  NButton,
  NGlobalStyle,
} from 'naive-ui'

import myTheme from './theme.js'

// 引入 NProgress
import NProgress from "nprogress";
import { useRouter } from "vue-router";

const dark = ref(false)
// 向后代组件传递数据
provide('dark', dark)

const router = useRouter();
router.beforeEach((to, from, next) => {
  NProgress.start();
  next();
});
router.afterEach(() => {
  NProgress.done();
});

</script>
<script>
export default {
  name: 'App'
}

</script>

<style>
#nprogress .bar {
  background: linear-gradient(to right,#b3c9ff,#3e77fc) !important;
  height: 3px !important;
  border-radius: 2px;
}

#nprogress .spinner {
  display: none !important;
}
</style>
